SEARCH
Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.controller

Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.controller.AppointmentController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/appointments") public class AppointmentController extends Object
REST controller for managing appointment-related operations. Handles HTTP requests for booking, updating, deleting, and querying appointments.

  • Method Details

    • bookAppointment

      @PostMapping("/book-appointment") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse> bookAppointment(@RequestBody BookAppointmentRequest request, @RequestParam Long senderId, @RequestParam Long recipientId)
      Books a new appointment and sends an event message via RabbitMQ.
      Parameters:
      request - the appointment request details.
      senderId - the ID of the user booking the appointment.
      recipientId - the ID of the recipient of the appointment.
      Returns:
      a response indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • updateAppointment

      @PutMapping("/appointment/{id}/update") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse> updateAppointment(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody AppointmentUpdateRequest request)
      Updates an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the appointment to update.
      request - the updated appointment details.
      Returns:
      a response indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • addPetForAppointment

      @PutMapping("/appointment/{id}/add-pet") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse> addPetForAppointment(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody Pet pet)
      Adds a new pet to an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the appointment.
      pet - the pet details to add.
      Returns:
      a response indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • getAllAppointments

      @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse> getAllAppointments(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Retrieves all appointments with pagination.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number (default: 0).
      size - the number of records per page (default: 10).
      Returns:
      a paginated list of appointments.

    • getAppointmentById

      @GetMapping("/appointment/{id}/fetch/appointment") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse> getAppointmentById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves an appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the appointment.
      Returns:
      the appointment details or an error message.

    • deleteAppointmentById

      @DeleteMapping("/appointment/{id}/delete") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse> deleteAppointmentById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes an appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the appointment.
      Returns:
      a response indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • cancelAppointment

      Returns:

      Returns:
